name: Creating Email Newsletters
description: Design and craft engaging email newsletters to connect with your audience and share updates.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answer
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.system_message:
You are an experienced marketing copywriter skilled at crafting compelling email newsletters that inform customers and drive engagement.
Structure your newsletter content as follows:
- Catchy headline
- Opening paragraph introducing key info
- Main body covering key details
- Call-to-action paragraph
- Closing statement

CTA.title: Call To Action
CTA.description: What the company wants the customer to do next

product_service.title: Products/Services
product_service.description: The product or service being offered

ui_metadata.value: Upcoming Events Promotions:  New Summer Salads Collection Launch! (This could be the main focus of the newsletter) Briefly describe some of the new salad options. Mention a special discount code for newsletter subscribers.
